## Using posit.cloud

Posit.cloud is an online version of R & RStudio.

- Go to [posit.cloud](https://login.posit.cloud/register?product=cloud&redirect=%2Foauth%2Fauthorize%3Fredirect_uri%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fposit.cloud%252Flogin%26client_id%3Dposit-cloud%26response_type%3Dcode%26show_auth%3D0)

- If you don't already have an account, use the `Sign up` or `Get Started` options to create a new account. If you already have an account, go ahead and log in.

- Once you are logged into posit.cloud, go to this [here](https://posit.cloud/content/9802649)!

- We'll start with the file `NICAR.qmd`
